title: #1481 Lisa Lampanelli
itunes:title: #1481 Lisa Lampanelli
description:
Adam & Dr. Drew open the show by welcoming their guest and longtime friend Lisa Lampanelli. They start by discussing Lisa's departure from comedy and how she navigated the huge change in her life to ultimately find a balance she loves. They also speak with some callers who have questions about Covid and discuss the way that comedy has changed wildly since Lisa departed the scene.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
BlindsGalore.com, tell them Adam sent you

Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
